titleStmt.title: Historie & policie re-viewed, in the heroick transactions of His Most Serene Highnesse, Oliver, late Lord Protector; from his cradle, to his tomb: declaring his steps to princely perfection; as they are drawn in lively parallels to the ascents of the great patriarch Moses, in thirty degrees, to the height of honour. / By H.D. Esq.
titleStmt.author: H. D. (Henry Dawbeny)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nathaniel Brook, at the Angel in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
